item.title: Broadway Box Office: ‘Mamma Mia!’ Sees Highest Gross Yet
item.description: Jean Smart’s one-woman show ‘Call Me Izzy’ ended its run last week.

item.title: Broadway Box Office: ‘Gypsy’ Climbs to $1.6 Million In Final Week
item.description: The Broadway revival, starring Audra McDonald, played its last performance Aug. 17.

item.title: Broadway Box Office: ‘Hamilton’ Celebrates 10 Years, ‘Mamma Mia’ Keeps Climbing
item.description: ‘Hamilton’ celebrated 10 years on Broadway last week with a special matinee, invite-only evening show and a block party.
